name: Hurricane Pike
description: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

abilities.name: Hurricane Thrust
abilities.description: Pushes the caster and the enemy target away from each other. If cast on an enemy, greatly increases the caster's attack speed and — if the caster is ranged — grants them infinite attack range against the target for a few attacks, or until the buff expires. When cast on an ally or on self, pushes the target in the direction they are facing.
notes: Can be cast on Homing Missile
Cannot be cast on other Ward-type units
Cannot be cast on debuff immune enemies, but can be cast on debuff immune allies
Cannot be cast on leashed units
Does not move units affected by Flaming Lasso, Black Hole, Chronosphere, or Duel
Cannot push units through Kinetic Field or Arena of Blood
Destroys trees within 100 radius around affected units
Can move units over impassable terrain

abilities.name: Dragon's Reach
abilities.description: Grants flat attack range bonus to ranged wielders.
notes: The bonus attack range from multiple Dragon Lance-based items do not stack
Stacks additively with other ranged bonus attack range sources

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
180 mana, 0.75 mana regeneration and 1.5% flat base magic resistance
15, 20 and 15 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes respectively
22.5 main attack damage to universal heroes
